Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Chicago
ShortDescription: #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Chicago, Laramie, Washington, and Cicero due to police activity at Cicero/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Chicago, Laramie, Washington, and Cicero due to police activity Cicero/Chicago.

Allow extra travel time.
